name: Pitru Dosha
desc: Pitru Dosha is formed by the conjunction of Sun/Moon, Rahu & Saturn in the birth chart. This dosha give raise to various problems to the native. Pirtra dosha occurs due to bad deeds by ancestors, unsatisfied or restive souls of the ancestors/parents or delinquencies committed by the native in past life towards their parents
remedies:
Feeding cows with balls of cooked rice mixed with ghee
Offer service to parents, aged and disabled people, help the poor & needy people
Worship Shri Ram
Give financial suppor for a poor girls marriage.
